thread.title: No Joy for REIT Investors as Shares Miss Out on the Rally

author: Peter Grant
title: No Joy for REIT Investors as Shares Miss Out on the Rally
text:
While stock investors are loading up like kids in a candy store, shareholders of real-estate investment trusts are more like sad street urchins pressing their faces up against the window.
Last year, while the S&P 500 index soared 21.8%, the FTSE Nareit All Equity REITs index rose just 8.7%. So far this year, the S&P is up more than 6%, while the REIT index is down 2.4%.
REIT... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
